attempt_description:
(a|(ba))*

Matches "a" or "ba", can repeat any number of times (including 0 times).

For example: "", "a", "ba", "aa", "aba", "baa", "aaba"...

(bb)?

Matches 0 or 1 occurrence of "bb" (meaning "bb" is optional).

(a|(ab))*

Matches "a" or "ab", can repeat any number of times (including 0 times).

For example: "", "a", "ab", "aa", "aab", "aba", "abab"
